comments.body: Since `InvariantMonoidal` extends `Cartesian`, can these just live in the `InvariantMonoidal` companion object without also living here?
Good catch, indeed it looks like scalac is able to find the ones in `InvariantMonoidal` companion object!

Actually I take that back, the `tut` compilation fails because it can't find `Cartesian[Semigroup]` with this change. I reverted it and made this commit for reference: https://github.com/OlivierBlanvillain/cats/commit/07d2c14471a0fa8f105961685f1612c28a3785af
